body_html:
I solved this problem using
conda install -c https://conda.anaconda.org/jjhelmus tensorflow
Basically I installed tensorflow as conda package instead of creating a tensorflow environment. this way I did not had to change to root and didnt get any import errors. I can also use tensorflow on spyder.
body_text:
I solved this problem using
conda install -c https://conda.anaconda.org/jjhelmus tensorflow
Basically I installed tensorflow as conda package instead of creating a tensorflow environment. this way I did not had to change to root and didnt get any import errors. I can also use tensorflow on spyder.
body:
I solved this problem using 
conda install -c https://conda.anaconda.org/jjhelmus tensorflow
Basically I installed tensorflow as conda package instead of creating a tensorflow environment. this way I did not had to change to root and didnt get any import errors. I can also use tensorflow on spyder.
